title: Bloomberg Markets: Handmaid's Tale Emmy Breakout for Online TV
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Handmaid's Tale Emmy Breakout for Online TV
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010Brad Adgate\u0010Independent Media Analyst \u0010Lucas Shaw\u0010Entertainment Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing “The Handmaid’s Tale,” Hulu’s series based on Margaret Atwood’s novel about a dystopian near-future, won the Emmy award for best drama Sunday, the first time an online network has won the top honor in television.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
